subject: (anonymous)
body:
I am thankful for the recent reminder that love does not have to hurt. That a relationship does not mean bondage, but it can mean finding a new way to be free. For learning to exhale, rather than to always hold my breath.

\- anonymous (6/10/17).

[what are you thankful for?](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1X6z1T5sSBXxFpfGI7gPZzQIp_qgkDCsVVCLV4yrw1a4/edit)
